item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, join us for another fun and exciting party. We will be having a Massage party. We will be teaching the art of massage to others. Come experience a night to remember.  . I will be posting more details and location at a later time. We will be joined by some other meetup groups.

We will be having a potluck dinner so bring something to share.

Wear comfortable clothing such as sweat pants or loose clothing.

We will be joined by  the"Social Fun" meetup group!

The actuall address will be email a couple of days before the event although it will be held in Topsfield MA.

If you get lost look for the Tiki Torch at the begining of the driveway.

A donation of $3 would be appreciated

If you want you can always call me at:603-312-6735

Thanks

Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Massage Night
